about_the_game:
Full moon? Release the power of the werewolf with the Legendary Palace ~ Werewolf tileset for RPG Maker!

The Legendary Palace ~ Werewolf Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water tiles
Four types of flooring (concrete, tile, and two variations of smaller tile) in gray, blue and tan
Various spike traps, holes and debris tiles

Walls:

Wall tiles to match floor tiles, plus a roof tile with a leafy rough edge.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
claw marks and tattered fabric to add to the walls
treasure chest (with animated version)
push block (stump)
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
plus more!

Events and Animations

Treasure chest
Animated flames
